ideas.headline: Cut Ad Waste. Boost ROI. Instantly.
ideas.body: Tired of slow creative testing? Instantly iterate performance ads, find winners faster, and reallocate spend where it counts. Maximize your budget.
ideas.raw_llm_response:
```json
{
  "ideas": [
    {
      "script_id": "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-1234-567890abcdef",
      "headline": "Cut Ad Waste. Boost ROI. Instantly.",
      "body": "Tired of slow creative testing? Instantly iterate performance ads, find winners faster, and reallocate spend where it counts. Maximize your budget.",
      "cta": "Optimize Now",
      "keywords": [
        "ROI",
        "Ad Waste",
        "Budget",
        "Performance",
        "Iteration",
        "Optimization",
        "Scale"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-2345-67890abcdef0",
      "headline": "Accelerate Your Ad Iteration Cycles",
      "body": "Stuck in slow creative cycles? Our platform lets you instantly test and deploy winning ads, slashing time-to-market and boosting efficiency.",
      "cta": "Speed Up",
      "keywords": [
        "Iteration",
        "Creative Testing",
        "Performance Ads",
        "Speed",
        "Efficiency",
        "Time-Saving",
        "Agile"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "c3d4e5f6-a7b8-9012-3456-7890abcdef01",
      "headline": "Unlock True Ad Performance & Insights",
      "body": "Beyond surface-level data. Gain deep creative insights and instantly iterate for maximum campaign ROI. Stop guessing, start winning with data.",
      "cta": "Get Insights",
      "keywords": [
        "ROI",
        "Performance",
        "Insights",
        "Creative",
        "Optimization",
        "Data",
        "Strategy"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "d4e5f6a7-b8c9-0123-4567-890abcdef012",
      "headline": "Automate Your Ad Optimization. Reclaim Time.",
      "body": "Tired of manual data analysis? Our AI-driven platform instantly iterates ads, freeing your team to focus on strategy, not spreadsheets. Automate smarter.",
      "cta": "Automate Smarter",
      "keywords": [
        "Automation",
        "Optimization",
        "AI",
        "Data Analysis",
        "Efficiency",
        "Time-Saving",
        "Productivity"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-5678-90abcdef0123",
      "headline": "Scale Winning Ads, Instantly. No More Waiting.",
      "body": "Find your top performers and amplify them across channels in real-time. Stop waiting for manual reviews. Start scaling. Maximize your ad spend and growth.",
      "cta": "Scale Campaigns",
      "keywords": [
        "Scale",
        "Winning Ads",
        "Performance",
        "Real-time",
        "Ad Spend",
        "Growth",
        "Amplify"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
